overview: Scotland, 8pm, Summer. A bench at the beach, overlooking the sea. A man, Andrew, nervously awaits an imminent arrival: the man he has been sleeping with. Upset, he doesnâ€™t know what will happen next when he is joined by an awkward, remorseful, and anxious Lewis who needs to set the pair on a new path before returning to celebrate his marriage to his new bride.
title: Benched
